release_notes:
Updated coin screen to allow charting for single-transaction wallets.
Updated app and menu backgrounds to solid colors.
Updated default blocks to search for Hoard transactions.
Updated miscellaneous messaging.
Fixed issue where previously accessed settings screens could be rendered upon first navigation to a new screen.
Fixed issue where users could swipe back to the Login screen from the Wallets screen.
Fixed bug in derivation path of Ravencoin address generation.
Welcome to the first beta release of Hoard!
